Pre-Game Insights: A 22-year-old sensation is expected to make his Team India debut in the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mayank Yadav, a 22-year-old pacer, is expected to make his debut for Team India in the series against Bangladesh.
Others: India are set to take on Bangladesh in a three-match T20I series starting on October 6, 2024.
The squad for the series has been unveiled, and several players who will be playing in the upcoming Test Series against New Zealand have been rested for this series.
